      • getProducts

        @GetMapping(value="/products",
            params="search")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Product>> getProducts​(@RequestParam
                                                                                    java.lang.String search)
        The end point for GET {url}/products?search={pattern}
        Parameters:
        search - Pattern to search
        Returns:
        a json list of all the products matching the pattern

      • getProducts

        @GetMapping("/products")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Product>> getProducts()
        The end point for GET {url}/products
        Returns:
        a json list of all the products

      • getProduct

        @GetMapping("/products/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Product> getProduct​(@PathVariable("id")
                                                                   long id)
        The end point for GET {url}/products/{id}
        Parameters:
        id - Product id
        Returns:
        a json containing the product info and status 200 if the product is found or status 204 if the product is not found

      • addProduct

        @PostMapping("/products")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Product> addProduct​(@RequestBody
                                                                   Product newProduct)
        The end point for POST {url}/products/
        Parameters:
        newProduct - a json containing the info for the new product
        Returns:
        If the product is created successfully then status 201 and the product info is returned, otherwise it returns status 400

      • updateProduct

        @PutMapping("/products/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Product> updateProduct​(@PathVariable("id")
                                                                      long id,
                                                                      @RequestBody
                                                                      Product modifiedProduct)
        The end point for PUT {url}/products/{id}
        Parameters:
        id - Product id
        modifiedProduct - a json containing the info for the modified product
        Returns:
        status 200 if the product is found and updated or status 204 if the product is not found

      • deleteProduct

        @DeleteMapping("/products/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Product> deleteProduct​(@PathVariable("id")
                                                                      long id)
        The end point for DELETE {url}/products/{id}
        Parameters:
        id - Product id
        Returns:
        status 200 if the product is found and deleted or status 204 if the product is not found
